tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_on_off_budget CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_on_off_budget AS SELECT aav.amp_activity_id, v.budget AS budget, COALESCE(v.budget_id, -999999999) AS budget_id FROM amp_activity_version aav LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.amp_activity_id, (acv.category_value)::text AS budget, acv.id AS budget_id FROM amp_activity_version a JOIN amp_activities_categoryvalues aac ON aac.amp_activity_id = a.amp_activity_id JOIN amp_category_value acv ON acv.id = aac.amp_categoryvalue_id JOIN amp_category_class acc ON acc.id = acv.amp_category_class_id AND acc.keyname = 'activity_budget' ) v ON aav.amp_activity_id = v.amp_activity_id;
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_ssc_on_off_budget CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_ssc_on_off_budget AS SELECT aav.amp_activity_id, v.budget AS budget, COALESCE(v.budget_id, -999999999) AS budget_id FROM amp_activity_version aav LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.amp_activity_id, (acv.category_value)::text AS budget, acv.id AS budget_id FROM amp_activity_version a JOIN amp_activities_categoryvalues aac ON aac.amp_activity_id = a.amp_activity_id JOIN amp_category_value acv ON acv.id = aac.amp_categoryvalue_id JOIN amp_category_class acc ON acc.id = acv.amp_category_class_id AND acc.keyname='SSC_activity_budget'; ) v ON aav.amp_activity_id = v.amp_activity_id;
